biotools.summary: Mantis is a homology-based protein function annotation tool that integrates multiple reference data sources. It uses multiple high-quality data sources as a reference, however custom reference data sources can also be added. Mantis does not use a pre-built database, instead, it dynamically integrates the multiple sources into a consensus-driven output. Mantis is extensively customizable and is available on Linux.
